name: Spinner Bumper IO
description:
Outsmart your opponents. Dodge obstacles.
Outplay other bladers and become champion of the Spinner Bumper competition!

- Use good timing and maneuver to dodge incoming opponents.
- Choose your beyblade.
- Knock your opponents off to become bigger and stronger!
- Compete with friends to survive the longest.

An io game optimized for variety of different devices, inspired by the Beyblade series.
